Montreal Collective

A list of the best Montreal startups, companies, agencies, investors, and events.

  • Crew

    crew.co

    A premium marketplace of the best design and development freelancers in the world.

  • Unsplash

    unsplash.com

    Free (do whatever you want) high-resolution photos.

  • CloudOps

    cloudops.com

    CloudOps offers high performance private and public cloud computing solutions with reliable and cost-effective operations.

  • Shopify

    shopify.ca

    Shopify is a powerful ecommerce website platform that makes selling online easy by providing all of the tools needed to create a beautiful online store.

  • Real Ventures

    realventures.com

    Real Ventures is Canada’s largest and most active seed venture fund investing in web, mobile, Saas and gaming. They work with inspiring entrepreneurs who exhibit unique ins...

  • Dribbble Meetup

    mtldribbblemeetup.com

    An informal event for designers, developers, and creatives hosted by designer Kevin Clark of Shopify, held monthly in downtown Montreal/Plateau.

  • CakeMail

    cakemail.com

    CakeMail makes email marketing simple with tools to create and send emails quickly and easily.

  • Behance Meetup

    meetup.com/BehanceReviews/Montreal-CA/

    Bringing members together to present and get feedback on their work, hear from experienced professionals, and meet the local creative community.

  • Planbox

    planbox.com

    Planbox is an agile management tool that makes it easy to map out entire projects with a single tool.

  • Transit App

    thetransitapp.com

    Transit is the simple and beautiful way to get around. Available on iOS and Android.

  • Breather

    breather.com

    Breather gives users access to private, beautiful spaces for working, meetings, and relaxing using only your iPhone.

  • BDC

    bdc.ca

    BDC is the only bank dedicated exclusively to entrepreneurs, offering financing, venture capital and consulting services.

  • C2MTL

    c2mtl.com

    C2MTL is an immersive three-day event with world-renowned speakers, interactive exhibits, collaborative workshops and a creativity Boot Camp.

  • FounderFuel

    founderfuel.com

    FounderFuel is a top tier mentor-driven accelerator that helps early stage web, mobile and SaaS startups raise seed capital.

  • Notman House

    notman.org

    Notman House is Montréal’s technology hub and home of the web. Hang out in the downstairs café, meet young entrepreneurs and startups, and join in at events.

  • FounderFuel Demo Day

    founderfuel.com/category/demo-day/

    Watch newly created startups pitch to a crowd of investors, entrepreneurs, and press as part of the FounderFuel accelerator program.

  • Context.IO

    context.io

    Context.IO takes care of syncing email data for apps, making it easy to integrate email data into any application.

  • Startup Weekend

    montreal.startupweekend.org

    Startup Weekend is an opportunity to meet project leaders, web professionals, and entrepreneurs. Come share ideas, form teams, and launch startups!

  • Frank & Oak

    frankandoak.com

    Frank & Oak is an online retailer that designs, manufactures, and curates a monthly collection of fine clothing and accessories.

  • Creative Mornings

    creativemornings.com/cities/mtl

    An event put together by Plank's Steve Bissonnette, CM meets at 8am on the last Friday of every month, showcasing unique speakers from various Montreal creative hotspots.

  • CocoaHeads

    cocoaheadsmtl.com

    iOS and Mac developers, assemble! Hosted at McKibbin's on the second Tuesday of every month, showcasing drinks, food and talks from local Apple developers and designers.

  • underlabs

    underlabs.ca

    A software engineering mobile development workshop catererd to Montreal's entrepreneurs, startups and enterprises.

  • FreshMint

    freshmint.com

    FreshMint cooks up delicious wholesome meals and delivers them in record times for unbeatable value.

  • Busbud

    busbud.com

    Busbud makes bus travel easy. By connecting travelers to bus operators, Busbud makes it a breeze to search, compare and book city-to-city bus tickets, all around the world.

  • 1dev.ca

    1dev.ca

    1dev is a company created to build instant connections between clients and freelancers in the technology industry, while saving time.

  • Provender

    provender.com

    Provender is an online marketplace connecting chefs and grocers with local farms to facilitate a direct supply of goods.

  • LightSpeed

    lightspeedretail.com

    Lightspeed is a Cloud Point of Sale system to manage inventory, engage customers, and enable selling anywhere.

    A marketplace of the world's best flight and travel experts, at your service. They combine deep industry experience with complex search algorithms to help you travel farthe...

  • Potloc

    potloc.com

    Thanks to Potloc, choose the next stores you want to have in your neighborhood!

  • 2PS

    2ps.com

    2PS assemble teams of experienced business professionals offering a wide variety of consultancy assistance to businesses.
